Docs.summary: Represents a static header item on a smart tag panel. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Like the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem> base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem> represents individual static text items in a smart tag panel. However, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem> entries are displayed using bold text. Typically, a header item is used to create a heading for a group of items in a panel. Clicking on a header item causes no action.
Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class.
